title: UMass Chan Medical School
description: Welcome to UMass Chan Medical School, the commonwealth's first and only public academic health sciences center.
cleaned_text: At UMass Chan, it's not just what we do. It's how we do it—together. We train the next generation of physicians, scientists and advanced practice nurses. We lead groundbreaking research and clinical trials. We work to make communities healthier. And we do it with a drive to collaborate and share knowledge that leads to important medical discoveries and inspires caregivers who put you first. At UMass Chan, we are, proudly, advancing together. 2023 Convocation Week events Up next: White Coat Ceremony Friday, Sept. 8, 2 p.m. [Watch live](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zV_j8kX-GDQ) What makes UMass Chan Medical School unique? News - Sep 7, 2023Read more - Sep 6, 2023 Celebrating collaboration, UMass Chan launches 'Advancing Together' brandRead more - Sep 5, 2023 UMass Chan's future 'Wellness Farm' to serve as living laboratory of community collaborationRead more Explore our schools [Morningside Graduate School of Biomedical Sciences](/gsbs/) Learn in an environment where students drive world-class research and innovation in areas such as biochemistry, biostatistics, cancer biology and neuroscience. [Tan Chingfen Graduate School of Nursing](/gsn/) Prepare for a career as a nurse, nurse practitioner or nurse scientist, led by distinguished faculty who promote health equity to improve health and quality of life. [T.H. Chan School of Medicine](/som/) Pursue one of the nation's best primary care educations, with a focus on patient-centered care in urban and rural communities or an MD/MBA or MD/PhD option. UMass Chan Medical School's unique business divisions [MassBiologics](/massbiologics/) MassBiologics of UMass Chan Medical School, with locations in Boston and Fall River, is the only nonprofit, FDA-licensed manufacturer of vaccines and biologics in the United States. [ForHealth Consulting](https://forhealthconsulting.umassmed.edu/) ForHealth Consulting is the public service consulting and operations division of UMass Chan Medical School.
